subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=櫡,筯,筷-Min}}

The Classical Chinese word for "chopsticks". It has been replaced by {{zh-l|筷子}} in many dialects for taboo reasons, avoiding homophony with {{zh-l|住|stopping}} in boatmen's language. Still used in almost all Min dialects and in sporadically in other topolects, especially in dialects that have some contact with Min.
